android.text
类 SpannedString

java.lang.Object
  android.text.SpannedString
所有已实现的接口：
GetChars, Spanned, CharSequence
public final class SpannedString
extends Object
implements CharSequence, GetChars, Spanned

This is the class for text whose content and markup are immutable. For mutable markup, see SpannableString; for mutable text, see SpannableStringBuilder.

字段摘要

构造方法详细信息

SpannedString

public SpannedString(CharSequence source)
方法详细信息

subSequence

public CharSequence subSequence(int start,
                                int end)
从接口 CharSequence 复制的描述
Returns a CharSequence from the start index (inclusive) to the end index (exclusive) of this sequence.

指定者：
接口 CharSequence 中的 subSequence
参数：
start - the start offset of the sub-sequence. It is inclusive, that is, the index of the first character that is included in the sub-sequence.
end - the end offset of the sub-sequence. It is exclusive, that is, the index of the first character after those that are included in the sub-sequence
返回：
the requested sub-sequence.

toString

public final String toString()
从类 Object 复制的描述
Returns a string containing a concise, human-readable description of this object. Subclasses are encouraged to override this method and provide an implementation that takes into account the object's type and data. The default implementation simply concatenates the class name, the '@' sign and a hexadecimal representation of the object's Object.hashCode(), that is, it is equivalent to the following expression: 
 getClass().getName() + '@' + Integer.toHexString(hashCode())

覆盖：
类 Object 中的 toString
返回：
a printable representation of this object.
